text: Ant√≥nio Paulo Kassoma (born 6 June 1951) is an Angolan politician. He was the Prime Minister of Angola in September 2008 until February 2010."Empossado novo primeiro-ministro" , Angola Press, 30 September 2008 . Kassoma was President of the National Assembly of Angola from 2010 to 2012. ==References== Category:Prime Ministers of Angola Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Paulo Kassoma
